examples.korean: Yu Myung-hwan, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, called in Japanese Ambassador to Seoul Toshinori Shigeie to deliver a message of protest over a news report that Japan’s Education Ministry plans to refer the islets as Japanese Territory in its revised curriculum handbook for teachers and textbook publishers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 외교통상부 유명환 장관은 일본 교육부가 선생님과 교과서 출판자들을 위한 개정된 교과서에 독도를 일본 영토로 언급하려는 계획에 대한 항의를 전달하기 위해 서울의 일본 대사 토시노리 시게이를 불렀습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Yu Myung-hwan, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, called in Japanese Ambassador to Seoul Toshinori Shigeie to deliver a message of protest over a news report that Japan’s Education Ministry plans to refer the islets as Japanese Territory in its revised curriculum handbook for teachers and textbook publishers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Youbuy what you need, when you need it—avoiding overspending and deferring capital expenses until they are absolutely necessary. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그리고 필요한 제품을 필요한 시게에 구입하게 되므로과다 지출을 피하고 꼭 필요할 때까지 자본 지출을 지연할 수 있습니다. hansemEUG
examples.english: Youbuy what you need, when you need it—avoiding overspending and deferring capital expenses until they are absolutely necessary. Add to Wordbook
